00025 template <typename PixelType, typename KernelType> 
00026 class TKernel2d
00027 {
00028 public:
00029        typedef iimg::TBitmapIterator2d<PixelType> BitmapIterator;
00030        typedef std::pair<int /*pixel offset*/, KernelType /*kernel weight*/> KernelValue;
00031        typedef std::vector<KernelValue> KernelValues;
00032        typedef typename KernelValues::const_iterator Iterator;
00033 
00037        void InitForBitmap(const iimg::IBitmap& bitmap) const;
00038 
00039        Iterator Begin() const;
00040        Iterator End() const;
00041 
00042        double GetWeightsSum() const;
00043        i2d::CRectangle GetBoundingBox() const;
00044 
00045 protected:
00046        KernelValues m_values;
00047        ibase::CSize m_kernelSize;
00048 
00049        double m_sumWeights;
00050 };
00051 
00052 
00053 template <typename PixelType, typename KernelType> 
00054 void TKernel2d<PixelType, KernelType>::InitForBitmap(const iimg::IBitmap& bitmap) const
00055 {
00056        I_ASSERT(!m_kernelSize.IsNull());
00057        if (m_kernelSize.IsNull()){
00058               return;
00059        }
00060 
00061        int linesDifference = bitmap.GetLinesDifference();
00062 
00063        int halfWidth = m_kernelSize.GetX() / 2;
00064        int halfHeight = m_kernelSize.GetY() / 2;
00065 
00066        I_ASSERT((m_kernelSize.GetX() * m_kernelSize.GetY()) == int(m_values.size()));
00067 
00068        typename KernelValues::const_iterator elementIter = m_values.begin(); 
00069 
00070        for (int y = -halfHeight; y <= halfHeight; y++){
00071               for (int x = -halfWidth; x <= halfWidth; x++){
00072                      KernelValue& kernelValue = const_cast<KernelValue&>(*elementIter);
00073 
00074                      kernelValue.first = x + y * linesDifference;
00075 
00076                      ++elementIter;
00077               }
00078        }
00079 }
00080 
00081 
00082 template <typename PixelType, typename KernelType> 
00083 inline typename TKernel2d<PixelType, KernelType>::Iterator TKernel2d<PixelType, KernelType>::Begin() const
00084 {
00085        return m_values.begin();
00086 }
00087 
00088 
00089 template <typename PixelType, typename KernelType> 
00090 inline typename TKernel2d<PixelType, KernelType>::Iterator TKernel2d<PixelType, KernelType>::End() const
00091 {
00092        return m_values.end();
00093 }
00094 
00095 
00096 template <typename PixelType, typename KernelType> 
00097 inline double TKernel2d<PixelType, KernelType>::GetWeightsSum() const
00098 {
00099        return m_sumWeights;
00100 }
00101 
00102 
00103 template <typename PixelType, typename KernelType> 
00104 inline i2d::CRectangle TKernel2d<PixelType, KernelType>::GetBoundingBox() const
00105 {
00106        return i2d::CRectangle(m_kernelSize);
00107 }
